org.prebake.core
Interface ArtifactListener<ART>

@ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
public interface ArtifactListener<ART>

A listener that is alerted when a named artifact's state changes. An artifact is any input, output, or intermediate or ancillary structure that can change and need to be updated as files under the client dirs change. Artifacts include files, tool signatures, products, and actions.

Nested Class Summary
Modifier and Type Interface and Description
static class ArtifactListener.Factory
          Provides factory methods for common listener types.
